label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_029
content:
## 2024-09-30 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total flows: 11457011
- Unique source IPs: 1849
- Unique destination IPs: 5160
- Average flow duration (sec): 17.2
- Top protocol TCP percentage: 84.3
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 15.3
- ICMP percentage: 1.5
- Long-lived flows greater than 1 hour: 53
- East-West traffic percentage: 65.9

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total queries: 3811485
- Unique domains: 68129
- NXDOMAIN responses: 13269
- DGA suspected domains: 0
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 1947
- Average response time (ms): 7.6
- Cache hit percentage: 85.8
- TXT record queries: 380
- PTR queries: 7822

### Ids Ips Hits

- Anomaly detections: 27

- Severity medium: 47
- Severity low: 411
- Top signatures:

  - ET SCAN Nmap SYN Scan
  - ET EXPLOIT Apache Log4j RCE Attempt
- False positive rate percentage: 10.5

### Events
- IPS blocked 34 packets from 198.51.148.3: known scanner
- CT log alert: new certificate for mail.company.com issued by Sectigo — verified as authorized

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-30. 11457011 flows analyzed. 3811485 DNS queries. 623 IDS alerts (0 critical, 10 high). WAN avg 4.9/1.72 Gbps in/out. 3 BGP announcements.
